name: postwind
description: Real-time Tailwind-like CSS generator with pipe notation, shortcuts, and dynamic CSS injection

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && bun build src/lib.js --outfile dist/lib.js --format esm && bun build src/lib.js --outfile dist/lib.min.js --format esm --minify && bun build src/lib.js --outfile dist/lib.cjs --format cjs
scripts.dev: bun run bin/server.js & bun build src/lib.js --outdir dist --format cjs --outfile dist/lib.cjs --watch
scripts.publish: bun run build && bun run test && npm publish && exit

author: Dux
